attributes.action: Stop Minsters and the deadline of the end of year, to scrap 4000+ EU Laws.
attributes.additional_details:
Stop the Torries from taking every human right we have. Holiday pay, sick pay, woman maternity leave to name a few. I never asked for Brexit and I certainly don't give them permission to scrape thousands of laws. This is what Brexit was really about. Taking the working person rights away. STOP THE TORRIES and the likes of  Rees-Mogg making decisions that will effect this country for generations. This is the biggest 
threat to sovereignty, which Brexit was meant to save. Stand up and be counted!
attributes.background: Extended the end of year deadline. Give the power to MPs not Torrie Minsters to decide which laws to keep. The Torries over the least 11 years have destroyed this country. I won't trust them to open anenvelope,  let alone what laws to keep.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/625245
